posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

I know it's been a minute since I last posted, life's been busy. Went through my collection today and found a couple of HOFers I'd like to upgrade. They are very presentable and sharp 2's, but ideally I'd like to upgrade to 3's. Please let me know if any of these cards interest you. Will add cash/trade for upgrades. Thank you. 

Best regards,
Wazoo
Just turn your computer on its side works just as well :D
If you decide to sell, message me please.
